A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Good Movie- but FYI classic grammatical error in opening crawl.

"Only General Leia Organa's band of RESISTANCE fighters stand against the rising tyranny\, certain that Jedi Master Luke Skywalker will return and restore a spark of hope to the fight."

Noun is "band" which is singular
verb is "stand" which is plural

classic noun-verb disagreement
